name: DarkOut_TeamMamoth
description:
There's not enough Light!

Our Submission for the

AIE Gamejam 2/10/2022 Theres not enough _______

Description:

You have crash landed on an unknown planet, find spaceship parts around the map and bring them back to your crashed ship to repair it and escape!

-- Watch out there are monsters in the dark

Controls:

F to turn on and off the flashlight (Light is limited)

Left click when in trouble

E to interact with objects - (Refill light and pickup engine parts)

WASD TO MOVE Space to jump

Left-Shift to sprint

Team Members: (We are all online first year students) - midyear intake
